data.question: What is a Activity
data.answer: An activity is a single, focused thing that the user can do. Almost all activities interact with the user

data.question: What is a Fragment
data.answer: A Fragment represents a behavior or a portion of user interface in an Activity . You can combine multiple fragments in a single activity to build a multi-pane UI

data.question: What is a Layout
data.answer: A layout defines the visual structure for a user interface, such as the UI for an activity or app widget

data.question: What is a Widget
data.answer: Widgets are an essential aspect of home screen customization. You can imagine them as at-a-glance views of an app's most important data and functionality
